# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="16752-102">Adicionando sinalizadores e lembretes no Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16752-103">Para definir ou editar um lembrete para um evento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-104">Vá para [calendário](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-105">Selecione o evento que você deseja que seja lembrado e selecione as setas no canto superior direito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="16752-106">para expandi-la.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-107">Próximo a **lembrar-me**, escolha um horário de lembrete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="16752-108">Outlook.com salva automaticamente suas alterações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16752-109">Para lembrá-lo de acompanhar uma mensagem, você pode adicionar um sinalizador de acompanhamento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-110">Ir para [email](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-111">Na lista de mensagens, passe o mouse sobre a mensagem para ver a opção sinalizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16752-112">Selecionar o ícone de sinalizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="16752-113">para sinalizar a mensagem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16752-114">Para ver todas as mensagens sinalizadas, selecione a marca de seleção no canto inferior esquerdo da página para ir para tarefas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="16752-115">Para saber mais, leia [Sinalizar ou fixar uma mensagem no Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16752-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
